education.degree: Bachelor Of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
education.institution: Dwarkadas J. Sanghavi College of Engineering, Mumbai University
Rustomjee International School & Junior College, Dahisar -west

experience.description:
Leading a 1-year AI project funded by Mozilla Firefox under the guidance of an MIT researcher, focused on building a communication-enhancing AI bot.
Developing real-time speech analysis tools to assist public speakers and language learners with personalized feedback on pace, grammar, fillers, and emotional tone.
Collaborating with a New York-based nonprofit to deploy scalable AI solutions aimed at improving professional communication skills.

Edited high-quality video content for social media enhancing viewer engagement.
Collaborated with creative teams to conceptualize and execute video projects, ensuring alignment with brand vision and messaging.
Received positive feedback from clients and stakeholders for delivering high-quality edits that meet project goals.

volunteering.description: Served as a Volunteer and Committee Member in the Publicity and Hospitality Department, coordinating with artists and content creators while managing publicity efforts to ensure successful events. Currently serving as the Vice Chairperson of the Hospitality Department, overseeing operations and leading a team to deliver exceptional service and seamless coordination.

With experience in publicity, I co-created impactful Instagram content and successfully organized events to elevate brand visibility and engagement. Currently, as Publicity Head, I oversee all publicity efforts, developing and executing strategies to enhance brand recognition, strengthen media relations, and drive audience engagement.
